name: Philip Potter (@philandstuff@hachyderm.io)
summary:
Today we went to a cafe (one that serves both Horlicks and Bovril, to set the scene), and I ordered the biggest breakfast on the menu. When it arrived, I found out that my dear wife Sonia had made a bet with our friend about whether I would finish it. 

The worse bit is SHE TOOK THE “he won’t tho” SIDE OF THE BET
